name: airstrip
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, flat piece of land from which trees, rocks, etc. have been removed so that aircraft can take off and land: We landed at a tiny airstrip in the middle of the jungle. Synonyms
landing strip
runway (AIRCRAFT)
